title: Three Bowls Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Western, Juice bar, Take-out, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Breakfast items are all veg; lunch dishe are individually prepared with vegan health slices available; dinner menu includes vegan and vegetarian choices. Menus change seasonally. Cafe is based on a Zen buddhist philosophy that promotes mindful eating and reciprocal giving and receiving. Each of the bowls is symbolic with one to attract positivity, one to repel negativity and one to free all beings.
